games.name: Celestial Clash
description: Designed UI/UX for a space/celestial-themed multi-player fighting game centering around Zodiac combos
Communicated with 8 team members in the first 3 months, then 11 in the remaining months using Agile development cycles
Designed character art pose present in the lobby

games.name: Magician's Umbrella
description: Created concept art and helped finalize design of main character
Communicated with 11 team members on art progress and feedback in 4 months of Agile development cycles

games.name: Tomo no Taiko
description: Designed and finalized 2nd main character and taiko drum asset
Communicated with 10 team members on art progress and feedback in 4 months of Agile development cycles

games.name: Last Night in Arcadia
description: Designed several concept art for 1 character and UI/UX
Communicated with 9 team members on art progress and feedback in 4 months of Agile development cycles
